import React from 'react' import './Page02.css' import imgpage02left from './images/page02leftimg.jpg' function Page02() { return (

MAKING THE PERFECT BLEND OF DIGITAL AGE

In a time and age where the marketing scenario is volving way beyond what meets the eye, Digital medium provides wide scope to build any concept, product or service, the task of creating world class advertisements involves the collective ideas and creative expanse of the creators. As an expert in the Digital media field, we feel there is dire need for mediation through trainingand interactive learning for exchange of vital information, ideas and best practices.

According to the latest studies Indian digital market is growing at a rate of 20% in the year of 2021 making it reach a market size of Rs. 18,398 crore. The same industry is expecting a CAGR growth rate of 22.47% to reach Rs. 23,673 crore by 2022.

THIS DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE WILL ENABLE YOUR SUCCESSFULL CAREER AS WELL AS BUSINESS ENHANCEMENT

) } export default Page02
